title: The Future of Banking — Brought to you by Copper
content: The Block’s Senior Correspondent Ryan Weeks took a look at the future of banking, featuring guests building the next generation of infrastructure and services.
Watch the video above to learn more about what our panelists have to say.
Keith Grose – Head of International at Plaid
Benjamin Duve – Head of Digital Assets and Custody at Commerzbank
